LanguageData.Turret_Ballista.label: ballista
LanguageData.Turret_Ballista.description: A crossbow-like siege weapon which can launch large bolt toward your opponents. Shoots slow, but accurate, and deadly.
LanguageData.Turret_BallistaGun.label: ballista
LanguageData.Bolt_Ballista.label: ballista bolt
LanguageData.Turret_Triplecrossbow.label: triple-bow crossbow
LanguageData.Turret_Triplecrossbow.description: Triple-bow crossbow, a kind of bed crossbow, actually composed of three bows and is set on a bed-like structure. It can shoot the farthest, and the most powerful bolts.
LanguageData.Turret_TriplecrossbowGun.label: triple-bow crossbow
LanguageData.Bolt_Triplecrossbow.label: triple-bow crossbow bolt
LanguageData.Turret_Trebuchet.label: trebuchet
LanguageData.Turret_Trebuchet.description: An enormous siege engine designed to smash walls from distance. You can launch stones toward your opponents.
LanguageData.Turret_TrebuchetGun.label: trebuchet
LanguageData.Turret_TrebuchetGun.description: Main part of trebuchet, which you can used to destroy your enemies from distances.
LanguageData.Turret_Catapult.label: catapult
LanguageData.Turret_Catapult.description: A siege weapon that can shoot stones toward your enemies.
LanguageData.Turret_CatapultGun.label: catapult
LanguageData.Turret_CatapultGun.description: Main part of catapult, which you can used to destroy your enemies from distances.
